description: Makes firm, wind-crusted snow and icy sections way less sketch. These crampons fit G3® touring tech bindings and can be easily installed and removed with one hand. Smart.Universal mounting works on G3 Ion, Onyx bindings. G3 Targa bindings and many tech binding/ski combos may require new holes drilled.Made of strong, light embossed 7075-aluminum.Functional with climbing heels deployed.To fit ski waists of 85mm, 105mm and 130mm.
name: G3 Ion/Onyx Crampons
